title: LEGO Poro
body: My father and I have combined our interests and made something amazing; a Poro (that evidently has met with Braum at some point) comprised entirely out of LEGOs. He really ties a room together with his adorable-ness.

replies.body: It took me longer than I would like to admit to figure this out, hahaha.
Please explain to me, went over my head o_O
Your linked picture is gigantic btw.. and this is very well done :)

I love this! 

I've seen Poros made out of a bunch of materials (I love Poros, so I look all over the place), but I haven't seen a LEGO Poro! :3
Thank you very much! It took some thinking, and some repeated trips to the Lego store. I am glad you all like it! :3
Thank you for the more manageably sized picture, Icovarius. It is much appreciated by all.
Much more manageable size and completely AWESOME!!  Great work!
Sorry about the picture size, everybody... I am not exactly a tech expert, and I really wanted to get the pic posted ASAP.
That's awesome. You should make more. A Ward would be cool.
